title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 18.3 - Taking aquatic insects for bait
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 18.3 - Taking aquatic insects for bait

State Regulations

No person shall take aquatic insects for sale as bait nor
sell aquatic insects for bait without first obtaining a license from the
department to do so. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
18.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
